title: S rank but no mastery token
body: I have just played a game of ARAM as Ahri and got an S rank at the end of the game i have her at mastery 5 atm and should have gotten a token for getting an S- or higher. I have checked the wiki and it says that you are able to get the tokens on all pvp game modes and am wondering why i haven't received my mastery token or if it just doenst show up but i have earned it.

replies.body: Hey riot I just played a few games of ranked and didnâ€™t get my m6 tokens with fizz I got s and s+ with him and no token. How do I send the pictures

Ahhhhhh this is a pretty simple problem that most people miss on the [**Champion Mastery Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide#h1q7). Champion mastery tokens cannot be earned on ARAM, you can only get those tokens from getting an S- or above on SR Normal and Ranked games.
